de.systemagmbh.tools.bus
Interface ISysBusConstants

public interface ISysBusConstants

The class ISysBusConstants.java was written for the constants used with the messages on the message bus. But it is of common use.
Last modification $Date: 2006/04/24 10:25:21 $.

Version:
$Revision: 1.2 $
Author:
Herbert Helmstreit

Field Summary
static String COMMAND
          The Label for a Command (service request) message type.
static String KEY_SIZE_OPTION
          Item name in configuration message section; append the size of the message as ISysMessage property.
static Integer MSG_GOOD_ECD
          The error code sent, if no error was detected.
static String MSG_HEADER_SENDER
          The Field name for the Sender in the Message body.
static String MSG_HEADER_SENDER_DELIMITER
          The separator for the MSG_HEADER_SENDER.
static String MSG_REPLY
          The Label for a Reply message
static String SYSCONTROL
          The Label for a SystemControl message type.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MSG_HEADER_SENDER

public static final String MSG_HEADER_SENDER
The Field name for the Sender in the Message body. By convention the sender info of the busses is in the form "user/application/version/instancenumber/host" If one of the values is not known, the field is left blank.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MSG_HEADER_SENDER_DELIMITER

public static final String MSG_HEADER_SENDER_DELIMITER
The separator for the MSG_HEADER_SENDER.
